sqlList.sql: select * from T_LM_TICKET_RULE order by ID

select tlu.packagecode AS "优惠券礼包编号", tlp.packagename AS "优惠券活动名" ,tlu.ticketusercode AS "优惠券号码", tlu.userid AS "用户ID", tlu.ticketamt AS "优惠券金额", CASE WHEN tlu.status = '0' THEN '有效' when tlu.status = '1' then '无效' when tlu.status = '2' then '已过期' when tlu.status = '3' then '已使用' ELSE '' END AS "优惠券权利状态", CASE WHEN tlu.flag = 0 THEN '前台领用' when tlu.flag = 1 then '后台批量生产' when tlu.flag = 2 then '手动发放用户' ELSE '' END AS "生成渠道" from t_lm_ticket_user tlu left join t_lm_ticket_package tlp on tlp.packagecode=tlu.packagecode where tlu.packagecode=:PACKAGECODE

select count(tltp.packagecode) AS ALLPG , tltp.packagetype from t_lm_ticket_package tltp where ((:PACKAGENAME IS NULL) OR (tltp.PACKAGENAME LIKE '%'||:PACKAGENAME||'%')) and ((:AMOUNTFROM IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT >= :AMOUNTFROM)) and ((:AMOUNTTO IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT <= :AMOUNTTO)) and ((:STARTDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE >= :STARTDATE)) and ((:ENDDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE <= :ENDDATE)) and ((:PACKAGETYPE IS NULL) OR (tltp.packagetype = :PACKAGETYPE)) AND ((:TICKETDT IS NULL) OR (:TICKETDT = '0' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') > TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (:TICKETDT = '1' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') <= TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') >= TO_DATE(tltp.startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) group by tltp.packagetype

select count(distinct tltu.userid) ALLUSER ,tltp.packagetype from t_lm_ticket_package tltp left join t_lm_ticket_user tltu on tltp.packagecode=tltu.packagecode and tltu.userid is not null where ((:PACKAGENAME IS NULL) OR (tltp.PACKAGENAME LIKE '%'||:PACKAGENAME||'%')) and ((:AMOUNTFROM IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT >= :AMOUNTFROM)) and ((:AMOUNTTO IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT <= :AMOUNTTO)) and ((:STARTDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE >= :STARTDATE)) and ((:ENDDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE <= :ENDDATE)) and ((:PACKAGETYPE IS NULL) OR (tltp.packagetype = :PACKAGETYPE)) AND ((:TICKETDT IS NULL) OR (:TICKETDT = '0' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') > TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (:TICKETDT = '1' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') <= TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') >= TO_DATE(tltp.startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) group by tltp.packagetype

select count(distinct dt.userid) AS ORDUSER, dt.packagetype from ( select distinct tltb.userid, packagetype from t_lm_ticket_package tltp inner join t_lm_ticket_user tltu on tltp.packagecode=tltu.packagecode inner join t_lm_ticket_sub tltb on tltu.ticketusercode=tltb.ticketusercode and tltb.STATUS='0' where ((:PACKAGENAME IS NULL) OR (tltp.PACKAGENAME LIKE '%'||:PACKAGENAME||'%')) and ((:AMOUNTFROM IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT >= :AMOUNTFROM)) and ((:AMOUNTTO IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT <= :AMOUNTTO)) and ((:STARTDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE >= :STARTDATE)) and ((:ENDDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE <= :ENDDATE)) and ((:PACKAGETYPE IS NULL) OR (tltp.packagetype = :PACKAGETYPE)) AND ((:TICKETDT IS NULL) OR (:TICKETDT = '0' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') > TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (:TICKETDT = '1' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') <= TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') >= TO_DATE(tltp.startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) ) dt group by dt.packagetype

select count(tltb.cnfnum) ALLORD,tltp.packagetype, tlo.price_code from t_lm_ticket_package tltp inner join t_lm_ticket_user tltu on tltp.packagecode=tltu.packagecode and userid is not null inner join t_lm_ticket_sub tltb on tltu.ticketusercode=tltb.ticketusercode inner join t_lm_order tlo on tltb.cnfnum=tlo.fog_order_num where ((:PACKAGENAME IS NULL) OR (tltp.PACKAGENAME LIKE '%'||:PACKAGENAME||'%')) and ((:AMOUNTFROM IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT >= :AMOUNTFROM)) and ((:AMOUNTTO IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT <= :AMOUNTTO)) and ((:STARTDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE >= :STARTDATE)) and ((:ENDDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE <= :ENDDATE)) and ((:PACKAGETYPE IS NULL) OR (tltp.packagetype = :PACKAGETYPE)) AND ((:TICKETDT IS NULL) OR (:TICKETDT = '0' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') > TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (:TICKETDT = '1' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') <= TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') >= TO_DATE(tltp.startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) group by tltp.packagetype, tlo.price_code order by tltp.packagetype, tlo.price_code

select count(tlol.id) AS SUCORD, tltp.packagetype, tlol.price_code from t_lm_ticket_package tltp inner join t_lm_ticket_user tltu on tltp.packagecode=tltu.packagecode and userid is not null inner join t_lm_ticket_sub tltb on tltu.ticketusercode=tltb.ticketusercode AND tltb.STATUS='0' inner join t_lm_order tlol on tltb.cnfnum=tlol.fog_order_num AND ((tlol.price_code = 'LMBAR' AND tlol.book_status = '5') OR ((tlol.price_code = 'LMBAR2' OR tlol.price_code = 'BAR' OR tlol.price_code = 'BARB') AND (tlol.FOG_AUDITSTATUS = '8'))) where ((:PACKAGENAME IS NULL) OR (tltp.PACKAGENAME LIKE '%'||:PACKAGENAME||'%')) and ((:AMOUNTFROM IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT >= :AMOUNTFROM)) and ((:AMOUNTTO IS NULL) OR (tltp.AMOUNT <= :AMOUNTTO)) and ((:STARTDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE >= :STARTDATE)) and ((:ENDDATE IS NULL) OR (tltp.STARTDATE <= :ENDDATE)) and ((:PACKAGETYPE IS NULL) OR (tltp.packagetype = :PACKAGETYPE)) AND ((:TICKETDT IS NULL) OR (:TICKETDT = '0' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') > TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (:TICKETDT = '1' AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') <= TO_DATE(tltp.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND trunc(sysdate,'dd') >= TO_DATE(tltp.startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) group by tltp.packagetype, tlol.price_code order by tltp.packagetype, tlol.price_code
